com.concurrent.programming

Class MathTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concurrent.programming.MathTools

  • public class MathTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Some methods for mathematical calculations like gcd and modulo.

    • Method Summary

      • meanTowardsMinusInfinity

        public static int meanTowardsMinusInfinity(int x,
                                           int y)
        Calculate the average of two numbers, rounding towards minus infinity. This does the equivalent of 
        (x+y)>>1
        , but handles integer over- and underflow correctly.
        Parameters:
        x - First number
        y - Second number
        Returns:
        The average.
